title: Easy peasy pizza
ingredients: ['375g (13 oz) strong white flour', '7g (1/4 oz) dried active baking yeast', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon of caster sugar', '230mls of warm water', '1 tin of chopped tomatoes (for the sauce)', '2 tablespoons of Tomato paste (for the sauce)', '1 small onion chopped & diced (for the sauce)', 'Basil finely chopped (for the sauce)', '1 clove of garlic finely chopped (for the sauce)', '1 teaspoon of chilli flakes (for the sauce)', 'Mozzarella cheese']
